about_the_game:
Get the SpellKnights Season pass and get all SpellKnights DLC for one great price.

The Season Pass includes:

  • Started Pack
  • Champion Pack
  • Leyend Pack
  • Master of the Arena
  • Traveler Pack

Do you want to be a pro of Spellknights? Get the Season Pass so that you can play with all features and characters from all packs together. Improve your way of playing!!
detailed_description:
Get the SpellKnights Season pass and get all SpellKnights DLC for one great price.

The Season Pass includes:

  • Started Pack
  • Champion Pack
  • Leyend Pack
  • Master of the Arena
  • Traveler Pack

Do you want to be a pro of Spellknights? Get the Season Pass so that you can play with all features and characters from all packs together. Improve your way of playing!!
name: SpellKnights - Season Pass

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64 Bit- Windows 7 Service Pack 1, or Windows 8
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual-Core 64 Bit CPU
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX10 Compatible GPU with 1 GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Device compatible with DirectX®10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: 64 Bit- Windows 7 Service Pack 1, or Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-3570 CPU @3.40 GHz
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RADEON HD 7900 Series
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Device compatible with DirectX®10

short_description: Get the SpellKnights Season pass and get all SpellKnights DLC for one great price.
